author: rgardler
msg: add notes about configuring Cocoon with a plugin

author: mmarinschek
msg: thanks to Udo Schnurpfeil for his suggestion on _ComponentAttributesMap.get

author: rgardler
msg: Plugins can now define their own *.xconf file to add configuration
information to cocoon.xconf. Simply place your *.xconf file in
PLUGIN_HOME/conf/*.xconf. Note that changes to this configuration
file will not take effect until Forrest has been restarted.
